## Xml.blockToDom() function

Encode a block subtree as XML.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function blockToDom(block: Block, opt_noId?: boolean): Element | DocumentFragment;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | The root block to encode. |
|  opt\_noId | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> True if the encoder should skip the block ID. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Element \| DocumentFragment
